languages.text: {n}Дэгген морщится, как от зубной боли.{/n} "Да если б я знал! Я впервые это имя услыхал, когда Денз отъехал. Может, какая-нибудь шлюшка, которая старость ему скрашивала? И он решил на радостях отписать ему или ей все свои богатства".

traits.locale_text: {n}Дэгген морщится, как от зубной боли.{/n} "Да если б я знал! Я впервые это имя услыхал, когда Денз отъехал. Может, какая-нибудь шлюшка, которая старость ему скрашивала? И он решил на радостях отписать ему или ей все свои богатства".

languages.text: {n}Daggen winces like he has a toothache.{/n} "I wish I knew! I first heard the name when Denz kicked it. Maybe Fidelio's a whore who put a smile on his face in his golden years? And so Denz decided to give them the whole kit and caboodle."
languages.original_text: {n}Дэгген морщится, как от зубной боли.{/n} "Да если б я знал! Я впервые это имя услыхал, когда Денз отъехал. Может, какая-нибудь шлюшка, которая старость ему скрашивала? И он решил на радостях отписать ему или ей все свои богатства".

traits.locale_text: {n}Daggen winces like he has a toothache.{/n} "If only I knew! I first heard the name when Denz kicked it. Maybe it's a whore who cheered him up in his golden years? And this Fidelio made him so happy he decided to give them the whole kit and caboodle."

{n}Daggen winces like he has a toothache.{/n} "If only I knew! I first heard the name when Denz kicked it. Maybe it's a whore who cheered him up in his golden years? And this Fidelio made him so happy he decided to give them the whole kit and caboodle."

{n}Daggen winces like he has a toothache.{/n} "If wish I knew! I first heard the name when Denz kicked it. Maybe it's a whore who cheered him up in his golden years? And this Fidelio made him so happy he decided to give them the whole kit and caboodle."

{n}Daggen winces like he has a toothache.{/n} "If wish I knew! I first heard the name when Denz kicked it. Maybe it's a whore who cheered him up in his golden years? And this Fidelio made him so happy he decided to give them the whole kit and caboodle."

{n}Daggen winces like he has a toothache.{/n} "I wish I knew! I first heard the name when Denz kicked it. Maybe Fidelio's a whore who put a smile on his face in his golden years? And so Denz decided to give them the whole kit and caboodle."

languages.text: {n}达根的脸抽搐起来，像是牙疼一样。{/n}“我也想知道！我是在丹兹咽气之后才听说了这个名字。说不定菲迪奥是个骚货，在丹兹意气风发的那段日子里给他弄得挺爽的？所以丹兹决定把他所有的东西都留给她。”
languages.original_text: {n}Daggen winces like he has a toothache.{/n} "I wish I knew! I first heard the name when Denz kicked it. Maybe Fidelio's a whore who put a smile on his face in his golden years? And so Denz decided to give them the whole kit and caboodle."

traits.locale_text: {n}达根的脸抽搐起来，像是牙疼一样。{/n}“我也想知道！我是在丹兹咽气之后才听说了这个名字。说不定菲迪奥是个骚货，在丹兹意气风发的那段日子里给他弄得挺爽的？所以丹兹决定把他所有的东西都留给她。”

languages.text: {n}Daggen hace una mueca como de dolor.{/n} «¡Ya me gustaría saberlo! La primera vez que oí ese nombre fue cuando Denz estiró la pata. A lo mejor Fidelio es una puta que le hizo sonreír en sus últimos años, y por eso Denz quiso dejarle hasta la última moneda».
languages.original_text: {n}Daggen winces like he has a toothache.{/n} "I wish I knew! I first heard the name when Denz kicked it. Maybe Fidelio's a whore who put a smile on his face in his golden years? And so Denz decided to give them the whole kit and caboodle."

traits.locale_text: {n}Daggen hace una mueca como de dolor.{/n} «¡Ya me gustaría saberlo! La primera vez que oí ese nombre fue cuando Denz estiró la pata. A lo mejor Fidelio es una puta que le hizo sonreír en sus últimos años, y por eso Denz quiso dejarle hasta la última moneda».

languages.text: {n}ダゲンは虫歯が痛むかのように顔をしかめた。{/n}「俺だって知りたいさ！デンツが泥酔した時に初めてそいつの名前を聞いたよ。フィデリオって、あいつの黄金時代によろしくやった娼婦か？ほんで、デンツは遺産を丸ごと渡すことにしたのかもな」
languages.original_text: {n}Daggen winces like he has a toothache.{/n} "I wish I knew! I first heard the name when Denz kicked it. Maybe Fidelio's a whore who put a smile on his face in his golden years? And so Denz decided to give them the whole kit and caboodle."

traits.locale_text: {n}ダゲンは虫歯が痛むかのように顔をしかめた。{/n}「俺だって知りたいさ！デンツが泥酔した時に初めてそいつの名前を聞いたよ。フィデリオって、あいつの黄金時代によろしくやった娼婦か？ほんで、デンツは遺産を丸ごと渡すことにしたのかもな」

languages.text: {n}Daggen windet sich, als hätte er Zahnschmerzen.{/n} "Wenn ich das nur wüsste! Ich habe den Namen bei Denz' Tod zum ersten Mal gehört. Vielleicht ist Fidelio eine Hure, die ihm in seinen goldenen Jahren ein Lächeln ins Gesicht gezaubert hat? Und darum hat er beschlossen, ihr alles mit Sack und Pack zu hinterlassen."
languages.original_text: {n}Daggen winces like he has a toothache.{/n} "I wish I knew! I first heard the name when Denz kicked it. Maybe Fidelio's a whore who put a smile on his face in his golden years? And so Denz decided to give them the whole kit and caboodle."

traits.locale_text: {n}Daggen windet sich, als hätte er Zahnschmerzen.{/n} "Wenn ich das nur wüsste! Ich habe den Namen bei Denz' Tod zum ersten Mal gehört. Vielleicht ist Fidelio eine Hure, die ihm in seinen goldenen Jahren ein Lächeln ins Gesicht gezaubert hat? Und darum hat er beschlossen, ihr alles mit Sack und Pack zu hinterlassen."

languages.text: {n}Daggen grimace comme s'il avait une rage de dents.{/n} « Ah, ça, j'aimerais bien le savoir ! Je n'avais jamais entendu ce nom avant que Denz passe l'arme à gauche. Si ça se trouve, c'est une putain qui lui a rendu le sourire dans ses vieux jours ? Et Denz aurait donc décidé de tout lui léguer ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Daggen winces like he has a toothache.{/n} "I wish I knew! I first heard the name when Denz kicked it. Maybe Fidelio's a whore who put a smile on his face in his golden years? And so Denz decided to give them the whole kit and caboodle."

traits.locale_text: {n}Daggen grimace comme s'il avait une rage de dents.{/n} « Ah, ça, j'aimerais bien le savoir ! Je n'avais jamais entendu ce nom avant que Denz passe l'arme à gauche. Si ça se trouve, c'est une putain qui lui a rendu le sourire dans ses vieux jours ? Et Denz aurait donc décidé de tout lui léguer ? »

languages.text: {n}Daggen, dişi ağrıyormuş gibi yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n} "Bir bilsem! İsmi ilk kez Denz mortoyu çekince duydum. Belki Fidelio, bizim ihtiyarı altın çağlarında memnun etmiş bir kevaşedir. Denz de varını yoğunu ona vermiştir."
languages.original_text: {n}Daggen winces like he has a toothache.{/n} "I wish I knew! I first heard the name when Denz kicked it. Maybe Fidelio's a whore who put a smile on his face in his golden years? And so Denz decided to give them the whole kit and caboodle."

traits.locale_text: {n}Daggen dişi ağrıyormuş gibi yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n} "Keşke bilsem! Bu adı ilk kez Denz'in vefatından sonra duydum. Belki Fidelio, altın yıllarında ona güzel anılar bırakmış bir kaltaktır. Denz de ona varını yoğunu vermiştir."
